data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jaeger, Peter, Kulkarni, Siddharth (2016): An unexpected new species of the genus Pseudopoda (Araneae, Sparassidae, Heteropodinae) from the Western Ghats in India. ZooKeys 577: 55-62, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.577.7848, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.577.7848
